section2.desc:
Experience in Technical Writing, IT Support, and Project Coordination across various industries, including finance, technology, and public services. Experienced in preparing technical documentation (SRS, BRD, User Manuals), supporting the implementation of large-scale projects like Modern Office at Bank Indonesia, and ensuring smooth IT operations in various companies. 
 
I also possess expertise in application development using Spring Boot and database management, as well as an understanding of graphic design using Photoshop and Illustrator. This combination of technical skills, communication, and project management makes me flexible in adapting to both business and technology needs
